name: Build a ZK circuit in Halo2 - the easy way
description:
Learn how to build a ZK circuit in Halo2 using our opinionated halo2-lib framework. We will provide documentation, scaffolding, and tooling as well as personal guidance.

Come with your project ideas or try one of our suggestions!

Audience:
ZK application developers who are looking for an easy-to-use Plonkish framework to build performant applications.
gpt_description: The video discusses how to write ZK circuits in Halo 2, a Rust library for creating ZK circuits. The library is flexible and modern, but can be difficult to use without the right knowledge. The video offers a solution with Halo 2 Lib, a library that simplifies the process of writing ZK circuits. The video walks through the Halo 2 scaffold repo, which provides a template for writing ZK circuits using Halo 2 Lib. The video also covers the benefits of using Halo 2, including the ability to use Rust features and a rich developer ecosystem.
